DOC.brief_summary: To explore antiviral efficacy , tolerability safety saquinavir plus zidovudine plus lamivudine .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Open-Label Exploratory Study Saquinavir + Zidovudine + Lamivudine HIV Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: A total 30 patient receive triple drug regimen saquinavir plus zidovudine plus lamivudine completion analysis least 4 week therapy .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV antibody positive . CD4 count > = 150 < = 500 cells/mm3 . Exclusion Criteria Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior antiretroviral therapy . Prior protease inhibitor therapy .
